data.expected_result: the role should be shown just fine ,the box should expand that it can show the largest role without getting cut off.
data.short_description: Names of roles with long names are cut off in roles filter box via members list
data.steps_to_repro: -click on members list under user management.-click on the roles filter box right to the members search bar (note that you should make a role with a long name,like"HEILDABBITOURMEMELORDSqUad2k17") :P
